full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPEN SA THUN MONGS MA YIN PA'I 'PHO 'KHRID RIN PO CHE'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES DPEN SA THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I 'PHO BA'I KHRID RIN PO CHE LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI LUNG RTOGS YON TAN DU MAS THUGS RGYUD GTAMS SHING @011B RNAM MANG RIG GNAS KYIS MDZOD LA MNGA' BRNYES PA SENGGE RI KHRID KYI GNAS BLA MA DGE SLONG DGE 'DUN CHOS 'PHEL GYIS BSKUL NGOR, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA YAB SRAS DANG, MKHAN PO KHI RIN PO CHE SOGS YONGS 'DZIN BZHI BCU LHAG TZAM GYI BKA' DRIN GYIS 'TSO ZHING, KHYAD PAR SHAR RTZI RDO RJE 'CHANG GI BKA' 'DRIN LA BRTEN PA DPEN SA SNYAN BRGYUD KYI MAN NGAG KHYAD PAR CAN MANG DU THOS PA, DKA' CHEN BYANG CHUB RIN CHEN GYIS DPEN GNAS SENGGE'I RI KHRID KYI BSTI GNAS, GNAS BLA MA'I GZIMS CHUNG DGA' LDAN GRUB PHUS SU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GNAS BLA MA NYID KYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,DGE'O, ,)
